name: CloudFlare
about: A public DNS resolver operated by Cloudflare that offers a fast and private way to browse the Internet.

name: Google
about: A free, global DNS resolution service provided by Google that you can use as an alternative to your current DNS provider.

name: OpenDNS
about: Predict and prevent attacks before they happen using our cloud-delivered enterprise security service. Protect any device, anywhere with OpenDNS.

name: Quad9
about: An open DNS recursive service for free security and high privacy. Quad9 is a free service that replaces your default ISP or enterprise Domain Name Server (DNS) configuration.

name: G-core
about: Gcore Public DNS is a fast and secure DNS resolver that provides you with a quick response time and absolute privacy. And it's free.

name: Yandex Basic
about: A Fast, Reliable and Free DNS for all users around the World.

name: Yandex Safe
about: A free DNS from Yandex that provides Extra Security options Like: Protection from dangerous websites, Protection from fraudulent websites and Protection from botnets.

name: Yandex Family
about: A free DNS from Yandex that provides Extra content-blocking options Like: Blocking websites with adult content, Blocking adult ads and pornographic content.

name: MSK-IX
about: Fast, secure and reliable DNS-cloud for you domain zones.

name: Verisign
about: Verisign Public DNS is a free DNS service that offers improved DNS stability and security over other alternatives.

name: Freenom World
about: Freenom World is free to use by everyone in the world. Millions of internet users are already using Freenom World. Freenom is about domains and DNS.

name: Quad101
about: Quad101 is a DNS resolution service initiated by the Taiwan Network Information Center (TWNIC).

name: 114DNS
about: Switch to 114DNS for stable and secure internet access! China's first cloud-based secure DNS, completely free and open to collaboration.

name: AliDNS
about: Alibaba Cloud Public DNS is Alibaba Cloud's global public recursive domain name resolution service for all Internet users.

name: Shecan
about: A fast and reliable DNS for Iranian users. Good for all kinds of Google services and other sanctioned services.

name: Begzar
about: Begzar is the name of a DNS service that supports many sites and services to remove sanctions. Begzar bypasses the sanctions of about 1000 sites. This DNS is specially designed for Iranian users.

name: Beshkan
about: With the Beshcan DNS service, Iranian users can easily access services such as Envato, Nvidia, Google Developers, Google Wallet, Visa, Paypal, Intel, Unity creative, Autodesk, and Amd.

name: Electro
about: A fast and reliable DNS for Iranian users. Good for all kinds of Games and Game Stores like Steam.

name: RadarGame
about: Enjoy the game, without limits. Play comfortably, play for free - the most popular ping reduction application in the Middle East. Recommended for Iranian users.
